price: 84. Oo ii yeel xus fiican facyada dambe dhexdood.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
